center-object.description: Center target object in wrist camera using base movement. Visual servoing with YOLO detection for positioning before grasping.
center-object.author: jarvis

count-people-in-room.description: Count people in room by 360° scan using base rotation and YOLO detection.
count-people-in-room.author: evil_sku

find-and-pick-up.description: Find and pick up objects by chaining center-object (rotation search + centering) and pick-up-object (visual servo grasp).
find-and-pick-up.author: jarvis

look-forward.description: Point wrist camera forward and detect objects with YOLO. Tilts EE ~40° to scan ahead.
look-forward.author: jarvis

pick-up-object.description: IBVS visual servoing with mask centroid. Two-phase (base→EE frame), XY+rotation search on detection miss, stays at found position, points EE straight down for final approach.
pick-up-object.author: evilsky, jarvis
